main event: A witness observed a bright light in the sky moving towards him in Dallas, Texas on September 3, 1966.
interesting points: The witness described the light as being about the size of a baseball, steady and bright without blinking,It moved silently at a fairly fast speed and hovered for about 2 minutes,The object had lights or windows around the rim and appeared round in shape,The witness, a college graduate, insisted it was not a conventional aircraft,No other neighbors reported seeing the object despite many being outdoors.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: a college graduate and respected member of the community
